verses.verse: A Prayer <S%H8605><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Bow <S%H5186><s%> down <S%H5186><s%> your ear, <S%H241><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> hear <S%H6030><s%> me: for I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%>
Preserve <S%H8104><s%> my soul; <S%H5315><s%> for I am holy: <S%H2623><s%> O you my God, <S%H430><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> that trusts <S%H982><s%> in you.
Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> to me, O Lord: <S%H136><s%> for I cry <S%H7121><s%> to you daily. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of your servant: <S%H5650><s%> for to you, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> do I lift <S%H5375><s%> up my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
For you, Lord, <S%H136><s%> are good, <S%H2896><s%> and ready to forgive; <S%H5546><s%> and plenteous <S%H7227><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> them that call <S%H7121><s%> on you.
Give ear, <S%H238><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to my prayer; <S%H8605><s%> and attend <S%H7181><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications. <S%H8469><s%>
In the day <S%H3117><s%> of my trouble <S%H6869><s%> I will call <S%H7121><s%> on you: for you will answer <S%H6030><s%> me.
Among the gods <S%H430><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> like to you, O Lord; <S%H136><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> are there any works <S%H4639><s%>like to your works.

All <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have made <S%H6213><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, O Lord; <S%H136><s%> and shall glorify <S%H3513><s%> your name. <S%H8034><s%>
For you are great, <S%H1419><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> wondrous <S%H6381><s%> things: you are God <S%H430><s%> alone. <S%H905><s%>

Teach <S%H3384><s%> me your way, <S%H1870><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> I will walk <S%H1980><s%> in your truth: <S%H571><s%> unite <S%H3161><s%> my heart <S%H3824><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> your name. <S%H8034><s%>

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you, O Lord <S%H136><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> my heart: <S%H3824><s%> and I will glorify <S%H3513><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for ever more. <S%H5769><s%>
For great <S%H1419><s%> is your mercy <S%H2617><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> me: and you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the lowest <S%H8482><s%> hell. <S%H7585><s%>

O God, <S%H430><s%> the proud <S%H2086><s%> are risen <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, and the assemblies <S%H5712><s%> of violent <S%H6184><s%> men have sought <S%H1245><s%> after my soul; <S%H5315><s%> and have not set <S%H7760><s%> you before <S%H5048><s%> them.

But you, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> are a God <S%H410><s%> full of compassion, <S%H7349><s%> and gracious, <S%H2587><s%> long suffering, <S%H750><s%> <S%H639><s%> and plenteous <S%H7227><s%> in mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth. <S%H571><s%>

O turn <S%H6437><s%> to me, and have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me; give <S%H5414><s%> your strength <S%H5797><s%> to your servant, <S%H5650><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of your handmaid. <S%H519><s%>

Show <S%H6213><s%> me a token <S%H226><s%> for good; <S%H2896><s%> that they which hate <S%H8130><s%> me may see <S%H7200><s%> it, and be ashamed: <S%H954><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you, LORD, <S%H3068><s%> have helped <S%H5826><s%> me, and comforted <S%H5162><s%> me.
